001package src.pkg_rooms;
002import src.pkg_items.ItemList;
003import src.pkg_items.Item;
004import src.pkg_models.Characterr;
005import java.util.Collection;
006
007 import java.util.HashMap;
008 import java.util.Set;
009 
010/**
011 * This class represents a room in the game with exits, items, characters, and doors / trapdoors.
012 *    
013 * @author Pierre MATAR
014 */
015public class Room
016{
017    private String aName;
018    private String aDescription;
019    private HashMap<String, Room> aExits; 
020    private HashMap<String, Door> aDoors;
021    private String aImageName;
022    private ItemList aItems;
023    private HashMap<String, Characterr> aCharacters;
024
025       
026    /**
027     * Constructor for the room, initializes the description, exits, and items.
028     * 
029     * @param pName The name of the room.
030     * @param pDescription A brief description of the room.
031     * @param pImage The image name associated with the room.
032     */
033    public Room(final String pName,final String pDescription, final String pImage) {
034        this.aName = pName;
035        this.aDescription = pDescription;
036        this.aExits = new HashMap<String, Room>();
037        this.aDoors = new HashMap<String, Door>();
038        this.aImageName = pImage;
039        this.aItems = new ItemList();
040        this.aCharacters = new HashMap<String, Characterr>();
041    }//Room
042    /**
043     * @return A string representing the description of the room.
044     */
045    public String getDescription() {
046        return this.aDescription;
047    }//getDescription
048    
049    /**
050     * @return The name of the room.
051     */
052    public String getName() {
053        return this.aName;
054    }
055    /**
056     * @param pDirection The direction of the exit (e.g., "north", "south").
057     * @return The room in the specified direction, or null if there is no exit in that direction.
058     */
059    public Room getExit(String pDirection) {
060        return this.aExits.get(pDirection);
061        
062    }//getExit
063    
064    /**
065     * @return A string listing all exits (e.g., "Exits: north south west").
066     */
067    public String getExitString() {
068        StringBuilder vSb = new StringBuilder("Exits:  ");
069        
070        for (String element : this.aExits.keySet()) {
071            if (this.aExits.get(element) != null)
072                vSb.append(element+" ");
073        }
074
075        return vSb.toString();
076        
077    }//getExitString
078    
079    /**
080     * @return A string listing the names of all characters in the room, or an empty string if no characters are present.
081     */
082    public String getCharactersString() {
083        if (!this.aCharacters.isEmpty()) {
084               StringBuilder vSb = new StringBuilder(".\nHere live"+ (this.aCharacters.size() > 1 ? " : " : "s : "));
085        for (String characterName : this.aCharacters.keySet()) {
086            vSb.append(characterName).append(" ");
087        }
088        return vSb.toString();
089        }
090        return "";
091    }
092    
093    /**
094     * @return A detailed string description of the room.
095     */
096    public String getLongDescription() {
097        
098        return "You are " + this.aDescription + ".\n" + this.getExitString() + this.aItems.getAllItemString(this) + this.getCharactersString();
099    }
100    
101 
102    
103/**
104     * Sets an exit in a given direction, specifying whether it is a locked door or a trapdoor.
105     * 
106     * @param pDirection The direction of the exit.
107     * @param pNeighbor The neighboring room in the specified direction.
108     * @param pIsLocked True if the door is locked, otherwise false.
109     * @param pKeyDoor The key item required to open the door, or null if not needed.
110     * @param pIsTrapDoor True if the exit is a trapdoor, otherwise false.
111*/
112       public void setExit(final String pDirection, final Room pNeighbor, final boolean pIsLocked, final Item pKeyDoor, final boolean pIsTrapDoor) {
113        this.aExits.put(pDirection, pNeighbor);
114        this.aDoors.put(pDirection, new TrapDoor(pIsLocked, pKeyDoor, pIsTrapDoor));
115    }
116    
117    
118    
119    /**
120 * Sets an exit in a given direction without specifying trap door status.
121 * By default, the exit is not a trap door.
122 * 
123 * @param pDirection The direction of the exit.
124 * @param pNeighbor  The neighboring room in the specified direction.
125 */
126    
127    public void setExit(final String pDirection, final Room pNeighbor) {
128        this.setExit(pDirection, pNeighbor, false, null, false);
129    }
130    
131/**
132 * @return The image file name.
133 */
134    
135    public String getImageName()
136    {
137         return this.aImageName;
138   }
139   
140 /**
141     * Checks if a given room is one of the exits from the current room.
142     * 
143     * @param pRoom The room to check.
144     * @return True if the specified room is an exit, otherwise false.
145     */
146    public boolean isExit(final Room pRoom) {
147        return this.aExits.containsValue(pRoom);
148    }
149    
150    
151    /**
152 * Checks if the exit in a specified direction is a trap door.
153 * 
154 * @param pDirection The direction to check.
155 * @return True if the exit is a trap door; otherwise, false.
156 */
157     public boolean isTrapDoor(final String pDirection) {
158        return ( (TrapDoor) this.aDoors.get(pDirection)).isTrapDoor();
159    }
160     /**
161     * Checks if the exit in a specified direction is a locked door.
162     * 
163     * @param pDirection The direction to check.
164     * @return True if the exit is a locked door, otherwise false.
165     */
166    
167    public boolean isLockedDoor(final String pDirection) {
168        return this.aDoors.get(pDirection).isLocked();
169    }
170    
171     /**
172     * @param pDirection The direction of the door.
173     * @return The name of the key item required to open the door, or null if no key is required.
174     */
175    
176    public String getDoorKeyItemName(final String pDirection) {
177        return this.aDoors.get(pDirection).getKeyItemName();
178    }
179    
180    /**
181 * Removes an exit in the specified direction.
182 * 
183 * @param pDirection The direction to remove.
184 */
185   
186    public void removeDirection(final String pDirection) {
187        this.aExits.remove(pDirection);
188    }
189    /**
190 * Adds an item to the room.
191 * 
192 * @param pItem The item to add to the room.
193 */
194   
195    public void addItem(final Item pItem) {
196        this.aItems.addItem(pItem);
197    }
198    /**
199 * Retrieves an item from the room based on its name.
200 * 
201 * @param pItemName The name of the item to retrieve.
202 * @return The item if it exists in the room; otherwise, null.
203 */
204    public Item getItem(final String pItemName) {
205        return this.aItems.getItem(pItemName);
206    }
207    /**
208 * Removes an item from the room based on its name.
209 * 
210 * @param pItemName The name of the item to remove.
211 */
212    
213    public void removeItem(final String pItemName) {
214        this.aItems.removeItem(pItemName);
215    }
216    
217    /**
218     * Adds a character to the room.
219     * 
220     * @param pCharacter The character to add.
221     */
222    
223    public void addCharacter(final Characterr pCharacter) {
224        this.aCharacters.put(pCharacter.getName(), pCharacter);
225    }
226    
227    /**
228     * Removes a character from the room.
229     * 
230     * @param pCharacter The character to remove.
231     */
232    
233    public void removeCharacter(final Characterr pCharacter) {
234        this.aCharacters.remove(pCharacter.getName());
235    }
236    
237     /**
238     * Retrieves a character from the room by name.
239     * 
240     * @param pCharacterName The name of the character to retrieve.
241     * @return The character if found, otherwise null.
242     */
243    public Characterr getCharacter(final String pCharacterName) {
244        return this.aCharacters.get(pCharacterName);
245    }
246    
247    /**
248     * @return A collection of characters in the room.
249     */
250    
251    public Collection<Characterr> getCharacters() {
252        return this.aCharacters.values();
253    }
254   
255} // Room
